original_text: so they too have now become disobedient in order that they too may now receive mercy as a result of God’s mercy to you.
korean_text: 이와 같이 이 사람들이 순종하지 아니하니 이는 너희에게 베푸시는 긍휼로 이제 그들도 긍휼을 얻게 하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: so they too have now become disobedient
in order that they too may now receive mercy
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 역시 이제 긍휼을 받기 위해

sentences.original_text: as a result of God's mercy to you
